overview.title: Inaugural General Meeting
overview.excerpt: Join us for our first official general meeting as we make our club official, affiliate with the Faculty of Science and Guild, and ratify our executive body.

details.title: Inaugural General Meeting
details.longDescription: Our inaugural general meeting marks the official launch of our club. We'll be affiliating with the Faculty of Science and the Guild, as well as ratifying our executive body. This is a key opportunity to get involved, meet fellow members, and help shape the future of the club—all from the comfort of your own space via Zoom.
